com.triolabs.fragment

Class ProgramDetailFragment

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.app.Fragment
      • com.triolabs.fragment.ProgramDetailFragment
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.content.ComponentCallbacks2, android.view.View.OnClickListener, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener

    public class ProgramDetailFragment
extends android.app.Fragment
implements android.view.View.OnClickListener
    ProgramDetailFragment es el fragmento muestra la informacion de un programa y su lista de capitulos
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Triolabs
